properties.areaDesc: Harbor Beach to Port Sanilac MI; Outer Saginaw Bay SW of Alabaster to Port Austin MI to Inner Saginaw Bay; Port Sanilac to Port Huron MI; Port Austin to Harbor Beach MI; Inner Saginaw Bay SW of Point Au Gres to Bay Port MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 2 at 3:46PM EST until February 2 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Expect sustained winds up to 23 knots from the west
with gusts up to 28 knots. The largest significant waves will
be 4 feet with a potential maximum wave height of 5 feet.

* WHERE...Port Austin to Harbor Beach MI, Harbor Beach to Port
Sanilac MI, Port Sanilac to Port Huron MI, Inner Saginaw Bay
SW of Point Au Gres to Bay Port MI and Outer Saginaw Bay SW of
Alabaster to Port Austin MI to Inner Saginaw Bay.

* WHEN...The maximum winds are expected around 6 PM EST Sunday
with the largest waves expected around 5 PM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING
